name: Porygon2
flavorText:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

previous.name: Donphan
previous.flavorText:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

next.name: Stantler
next.flavorText:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.flavorText:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

pokemon.name: Porygon2
pokemon.flavorText:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

pokemon.name: Porygon-Z
pokemon.flavorText:
Additional software was installed
to make it a better Pokémon.
It began acting oddly, however.
